alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 4:53PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MENDOCINO COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM PDT... At 451 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Laytonville, moving northwest at 20 mph towards Dos Rios across Highway 162. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dos Rios. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior
